statements: SELECT * FROM security_alerts;
SELECT id, alert_type, alert_message FROM security_alerts WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE sensor_id = 2 ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT camera_id, sensor_id, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Motion Detected';
SELECT id, capture_time FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire Alert' ORDER BY capture_time ASC;
SELECT id, capture_time, camera_id, sensor_id, alert_type, alert_message FROM security_alerts WHERE camera_id = 1 ORDER BY capture_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Motion Detected' AND sensor_id = 2;
SELECT id, alert_type, capture_time FROM security_alerts WHERE sensor_id = 3 ORDER BY capture_time ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_message LIKE '%fire%';
SELECT MAX(capture_time) AS latest_capture_time FROM security_alerts;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts;
SELECT alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE camera_id = 1;
SELECT id, camera_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Intrusion';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT sensor_id, notification_message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE sensor_id IN (1, 2, 3) ORDER BY sensor_id ASC, notification_timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Intrusion';
SELECT camera_id, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_timestamp > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, camera_id, alert_type, alert_timestamp FROM security_alerts ORDER BY alert_timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT sensor_id, notification_message FROM smart_home_notifications WHERE notification_timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_notifications ORDER BY notification_timestamp ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, description FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Intrusion';
SELECT timestamp, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM notifications WHERE timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00';
SELECT id, location FROM smart_home_cameras WHERE resolution = '1080p';
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'intrusion' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp, alert_type FROM security_alerts WHERE timestamp >= '2021-09-01' AND timestamp <= '2021-10-01';
SELECT id, description FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'fire' AND description LIKE '%smoke%';
SELECT id, timestamp, message FROM notifications WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT * FROM smart_home_cameras WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts;
SELECT camera_id, alert_description, alert_time FROM security_alerts WHERE notification_type = 'Intrusion';
SELECT camera_name, camera_location FROM security_cameras ORDER BY camera_location DESC;
SELECT notification_id, sensor_id, notification_type, notification_time FROM sensor_notifications WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT event_type, event_description, event_time FROM camera_logs WHERE event_type = 'Motion Detection' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts ORDER BY alert_time DESC;
SELECT camera_id, notification_type FROM security_alerts WHERE notification_type = 'Intrusion';
SELECT camera_id, camera_name, camera_location FROM security_cameras WHERE camera_status = 'Active';
SELECT notification_id, sensor_id, notification_time FROM sensor_notifications WHERE sensor_id = 101 ORDER BY notification_time ASC;
SELECT alert_id, alert_description FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_time >= '2022-01-01' AND alert_time <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM security_alerts ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT alert_type, timestamp FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire';
SELECT sensor_name, location FROM sensors WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM cameras WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY camera_name ASC;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM security_alerts WHERE alert_type = 'Fire' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT notification_id, user_id, message FROM notifications WHERE notification_type = 'Emergency' ORDER BY timestamp ASC;
SELECT camera_name, location FROM cameras WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT sensor_name, sensor_type FROM sensors WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY sensor_name;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NOT NULL;
